PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PipeSegmentOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Pipe segment occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcPipeSegment.

PropertyDef.Name: InteriorRoughnessCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: The interior roughness coefficient of the pipe segment.

PropertyDef.Name: Color
PropertyDef.Definition:
The color of the pipe segment.
Note: This is typically used only for plastic pipe segments. However, it may be used for any pipe segments with a painted surface which is not otherwise specified as a covering.

PropertyDef.Name: Gradient
PropertyDef.Definition: The gradient of the pipe segment.

PropertyDef.Name: InvertElevation
PropertyDef.Definition: The invert elevation relative to the datum established for the project.
